channel.title: wut on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in wut on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Keith Corrigan
item.description: 08:24 Thursday 31 May 2018 JST Keith Corrigan contacted me on FB, and I thought it was a fake account trying to lure money out of me, but now I am not so sure. I still have a guess that is the case, but it’s not as blatant as others I have seen.

item.title: CB request
item.description: 19:24 Wednesday 15 June 2016 JST Hi Rob. Please explain me how to make a link to open in a new tab. And how to add a link to an image. Hmm. I think they have some people who know HTML at CB.

item.title: today
item.description: 17:57 Friday 18 December 2015 JST Today included working on Patreon site, the piece I’ve been calling “Three or more circles”, AB website, discussing CB app, doing dishes, doing laundry, taking a nap, and now headed to Jon’s for poker night. (rare for me!) late Friday night lost all my monies by having a good feeling that I would win and went against Sam who went all-in near the end of the night.
